Class-Cleric 20 — Female Human Cleric: 20
Strength: 13 (1) Dexterity: 6 (-2) Constitution: 11 (0) Intelligence: 9 (-1) Wisdom: 18 (4) Charisma: 17 (3)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Chaotic Good Deity: None
Experience: 662514/1000000 Level: 20 Size: Medium Speed: 30 Carry/Lift: 195/390
Ability Notes:
Human Ability Adjustment: +1 Charisma/+1 Constitution/+1 Dexterity/+1 Intelligence/+1 Strength/+1 Wisdom
Stormborn: Has a 30' fly speed outdoors
Features/Skills
Proficiency Bonus: 6
Feat Count: General: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Cleric (Divine Domain)
Feats: Dual Wielder; Elemental Adept (Acid); Elemental Adept (Lightning); Grappler; Magic Initiate (Druid) Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Cleric Features: Acolyte Of Nature; Armor Proficiency (Light; Medium; Shield); Avatar Of Battle; Blessed Healer; Blessing Of The Trickster; Blessings Of Knowledge; Bonus Cantrip (Light Domain); Bonus Proficiencies (Tempest Domain); Bonus Proficiencies (War Domain); Bonus Proficiency (Life Domain); Bonus Proficiency (Nature Domain); Channel Divinity; Charm Animals And Plants; Cloak Of Shadows (Trickery Domain); Corona Of Light; Dampen Elements; Destroy Undead; Destructive Wrath; Disciple Of Life; Divine Domain; Divine Intervention; Divine Strike; Guided Strike; Improved Duplicity; Improved Flare; Invoke Duplicity; Knowledge Domain; Knowledge Of The Ages; Life Domain; Light Domain; Master Of Nature; Nature Domain; Potent Spellcasting; Preserve Life; Radiance Of The Dawn; Read Thoughts; Save Proficiency (Wisdom; Charisma); Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, Religion); Spellcasting; Stormborn; Supreme Healing; Tempest Domain; Thunderbolt Strike; Trickery Domain; Turn Undead; Visions Of The Past; War Domain; War God's Blessing; War Priest; Warding Flare; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons); Wrath Of The Storm Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Divine Domain: 1 selection
Channel Divinity: Can use a Channel Divinity effect 3 times per short rest
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of None and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: History; Insight; Medicine; Persuasion; Religion; Sleight Of Hand
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) -2 Insight: (wis) 10 Performance: (cha) 3
Animal Handling: (wis) 4 Intimidation: (cha) 3 Persuasion: (cha) 9
Arcana: (int) -1 Investigation: (int) -1 Religion: (int) 5
Athletics: (str) 1 Medicine: (wis) 10 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 4
Deception: (cha) 3 Nature: (int) -1 Stealth: (dex) -2
History: (int) 5 Perception: (wis) 4 Survival: (wis) 4
Languages: Common; Draconic; Dwarvish; Gnomish; Orc; Sylvan
Skill Notes:
Acolyte Of Nature: Skill Proficiency (Choose 1 from Animal Handling, Nature, Survival)
Blessings Of Knowledge: Skill Proficiency (Choose 2 from Arcana, History, Nature, Religion)/Language (Choose 2 from any)
Blessings Of Knowledge: +6 on chosen Blessings of Knowledge skills
Knowledge Of The Ages: Can use Channel Divinity to gain proficiency in a chosen skill or tool for 10 min
Combat
Hit Points: 89 Initiative: -2 Armor Class: 10 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Handaxe (+7 1d6+1 R20/60); Light Crossbow (+4 1d8-2 R80/320); Mace (+7 1d6+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Bonus Proficiencies (Tempest Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)/Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons)
Bonus Proficiencies (War Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)/Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons)
Bonus Proficiency (Life Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
Bonus Proficiency (Nature Domain): Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: -2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: -2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Destroy Undead: Turning destroys undead up to CR 4
Divine Strike: Weapon inflicts +2d8 HP weapon damage type once per rd
Dual Wielder: +1 Armor Class when wielding two melee weapons/Can use two-weapon fighting with any one-handed weapons/Can draw or stow two weapons simultaneously
Grappler: Has advantage on attacks on a grappled foe and can restrain a grappled foe with an additional successful grapple
Guided Strike: Can use Channel Divinity to give self +10 attack
Turn Undead: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to make undead flee (DC 18 Wisdom negates) for 1 min
War Priest: Can use a bonus attack to make an extra weapon attack 4 times per long rest
Wrath Of The Storm: Can use a reaction to inflict 2d8 HP lightning or thunder (Dexterity half) on a successful attacker 4 times per long rest
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 9; Constitution: 0; Dexterity: -2; Intelligence: -1; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 10
Save Notes: Avatar Of Battle: Has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
Magic
Spell Slots: C0: 5; C1: 4; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3; C5: 3; C6: 2; C7: 2; C8: 1; C9: 1; D0: 3; D1: 1 Attack: C: 10; D: 10 Spell DC: C: 18; D: 18

Suggestion (C2 [Read Thoughts] Ench): R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 8 hr
Symbol (C7 Abju): Inscribes a touch object with a permanent glyph that, when triggered, inflicts a choice of harmful magic effect—10d10 HP necrotic (save Constitution half), arguing for 1 min (save Constitution negates), frightened and fleeing for 1 min (save Wisdom negates), overwhelmed with despair for 1 min (save Charisma negates), insane for 1 min (save Intelligence negates), incapacitated by pain for 1 min (save Constitution negates), asleep for 10 min or until shaken or harmed (save Wisdom negates), or stunned for 1 min (save Wisdom negates)
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects—a booming voice, modification of flames, harmless tremors, an illusory sound, movement of a door or window, or a change in eye appearance—for 1 min
Thunderwave (C1 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (save Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Tree Stride (C5 [Nature Domain] Conj): Self may teleport 500' between like trees once per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Wall Of Fire (C4 [Light Domain] Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wind Wall (C3 [Nature Domain] Evoc): R120' Creates a 50'x15'x1' area that inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (save Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for concentration up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Acolyte Of Nature: Knows 1 druid cantrip
Improved Duplicity: Invoke Duplicity creates 4 duplicates
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 druid cantrips/Can cast a chosen D1 spell once per long rest
Blessed Healer: Casting a healing spell restores 2 + spell level hit points to self
Blessing Of The Trickster: Touch gives advantage on Stealth for 1 hr or until given to another target
Bonus Cantrip (Light Domain): Knows the Light cantrip
Charm Animals And Plants: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to charm beasts and plants (Wisdom negates) for 1 min
Cloak Of Shadows (Trickery Domain): Can use Channel Divinity to make self invisible until the end of the next turn; attacking or casting ends
Corona Of Light: Can use an action to emit a 60' bright light that inflicts foe disadvantage on saves vs. fire and radiant spells for 1 min
Dampen Elements: R30' Can use a reaction to grant resistance to immediate acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage
Destructive Wrath: Can use Channel Divinity to maximize lightning or thunder damage
Disciple Of Life: Casting a healing spell restores an additional 2 + spell level hit points
Divine Intervention: Has a 100% chance to gain help from None once per week
Elemental Adept (Acid): Spells that inflict acid damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Spells that inflict lightning damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Improved Flare: R30' Can use Warding Flare to protect another creature
Invoke Duplicity: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to create 4 illusionary duplicates, moving each up to 30' each rd to a maximum of 120' away, gaining advantage on attacks when self and duplicate are each within 5' of the target, and allowing remote spellcasting for concentration up to 1 min
Master Of Nature: Can command charmed animals and plants
Potent Spellcasting: +4 Cleric cantrip damage
Preserve Life: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to restore 100 hit points among targets, up to half maximum hit points each
Radiance Of The Dawn: R30' Can use Channel Divinity to dispel magical darkness and to inflict 2d10+20 HP radiant (Constitution half) on foes
Read Thoughts: R60' Can use Channel Divinity to read the target's thoughts (Wisdom negates and blocks additional uses until a long rest) for 1 min; success allows casting Suggestion on the target with no save
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the cleric spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Supreme Healing: Healing spells restore the maximum possible hit points
Thunderbolt Strike: Can cause lightning damage to also push away Large and smaller creatures 10'
Visions Of The Past: Can gain visions about surroundings or a held object via 1 min meditation once per short rest
War God's Blessing: R30' Can use a reaction and Channel Divinity to give an ally +10 attack
Warding Flare: R30' Can use a reaction to inflict disadvantage on a foe attack 4 times per long rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 7 allocated
